mapper.sql: id, eid, stime, etime, estatus, checked, sid, status
mapper.select: select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from weekly t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from weekly t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.status=0 order by t.stime desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from weekly where eid=#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from weekly t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.estatus=1 and t.status=0 order by t.stime desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from weekly where sid=#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and estatus=1 and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from weekly t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.estatus=1 and t.checked=0 and t.status=0 order by t.stime desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from weekly where sid=#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and estatus=1 and checked=0 and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from weekly t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.checked!=0 and t.status=0 order by t.stime desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from weekly where sid=#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and checked!=0 and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from weekly t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.estatus=1 and t.checked=1 and t.status=0 order by t.stime desc
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}
select count(*) from weekly where estatus=1 and checked=1 and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from weekly t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.checked>1 and t.status=0 order by t.stime desc
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}
select count(*) from weekly where checked>1 and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from weekly t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.stime <= #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.etime >= #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from weekly t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.stime <= #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.etime >= #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.checked=2 and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from weekly t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.stime >= #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.stime <= #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.checked=2 and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from weekly t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.checked=2 and t.status=0 order by t.stime desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from weekly where eid=#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and checked=2 and status=0
mapper.insert: insert into weekly (id, eid, stime, etime, estatus, checked, sid, status,remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{estatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into weekly
id,
eid,
stime,
etime,
estatus,
checked,
sid,
status,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{estatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update weekly
eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stime = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
estatus = #{estatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update weekly set eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stime = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, estatus = #{estatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, checked = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
